trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with a user event, to be tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un punto, associato a un evento utente, da rilevare nel percorso di esecuzione potenziale di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro radice.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un ActivityDesigner o una finestra di progettazione del flusso di lavoro può utilizzare il metodo di overload <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per instrumentare il flusso di lavoro per generare dati di rilevamento di runtime dell'infrastruttura come un evento utente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: I dati generati vengono chiamati per come dati utente.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di eventi dello stato dell'attività ed eventi di stato del flusso di lavoro, che si verificano solo alle modifiche di stato, gli eventi utente possono verificarsi in qualsiasi posizione instrumentata in un flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons to instrument a workflow to emit user events.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diverse ragioni per instrumentare un flusso di lavoro per generare eventi utente.

trans-unit.source: For example, a workflow designer may want to communicate logical state information about the progress of a workflow, or an activity designer might want to provide an opportunity to activity members at times other than an activity status change.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, una finestra di progettazione del flusso di lavoro potrebbe essere necessario comunicare informazioni logiche di stato sullo stato di avanzamento del flusso di lavoro o un ActivityDesigner potrebbe voler fornire una possibilità ai membri di attività in momenti diversi da stato dell'attività Modifica.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackPoint defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance associated with a user event.
trans-unit.target: UserTrackPoint definisce un punto di interesse nel percorso di esecuzione potenziale di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro radice associata a un evento utente.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackPoint contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and any additional data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: UserTrackPoint contiene percorsi inclusi nella corrispondenza, posizioni escluse dalla corrispondenza e dati aggiuntivi che devono essere estratti dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro quando esiste una corrispondenza per il track point.

trans-unit.source: You can add a UserTrackPoint to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere un UserTrackPoint per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per indicare al runtime per inviare l'infrastruttura di rilevamento un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>al servizio di rilevamento quando esiste una corrispondenza per il track point.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I dati utente vengono restituiti in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A single UserTrackPoint may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Un singolo UserTrackPoint potrebbe corrispondere a più punti nell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location associated with a user event in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>contiene le condizioni di corrispondenza per una posizione associata a un evento utente nel percorso di esecuzione potenziale di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>per definire le posizioni che devono essere incluse nella corrispondenza per il track point.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, è possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>per definire le posizioni che devono essere escluse dalla corrispondenza per il track point.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>oggetti e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>per specificare i dati che devono essere estratti dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro quando esiste una corrispondenza per il track point.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Verranno restituiti i dati estratti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>per specificare informazioni aggiuntive associate al track point.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Queste annotazioni saranno restituite in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this class, see the [Tracking Using User Track Points Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di come utilizzare questa classe, vedere il [rilevamento utilizzando traccia punti esempio utente](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito inizializza un track point vuoto.

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: Nessun posizioni corrispondenti, posizioni escluse, dati estratti o annotazioni vengono specificate.

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario configurare il track point aggiungendo almeno <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add the appropriate objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere facoltativamente gli oggetti appropriati a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di annotazioni associate al track point.

trans-unit.source: You can add to Annotations to specify annotations to be returned in Annotations when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere annotazioni per specificare annotazioni da restituire nelle annotazioni quando esiste una corrispondenza per il track point.

trans-unit.source: If Annotations is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Se le annotazioni è vuoto, nessuna annotazione associati al track point.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Le annotazioni sono `strings` definite dall'utente contengono informazioni associate al track point.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un'annotazione potrebbe contenere informazioni sul percorso di esecuzione potenziale il flusso di lavoro può prendere da questo track point, oppure potrebbe contenere informazioni da visualizzare in un'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una raccolta vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di posizioni che devono essere escluse dal track point dall'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in ExcludedLocations is matched for a particular user event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se una qualsiasi del <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>oggetti vuol dire esiste una corrispondenza per un particolare evento utente, il punto di traccia non verrà trovato e no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>verrà inviato al servizio di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If ExcludedLocations is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: Se vuol dire è vuoto, non esistono nessuna posizione è esclusa.

trans-unit.source: You can use ExcludedLocations to exclude specific locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare vuol dire per escludere specifiche posizioni dal controllo da parte dall'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can exclude a subset of locations that are specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> in order to more precisely refine the locations that should be tracked by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile escludere un sottoinsieme dei percorsi specificati in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>per definire con maggiore precisione le posizioni che devono essere rilevate dal track point.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> che specifica le posizioni da escludere dal track point.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una raccolta vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta che specifica i dati devono essere estratti dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro e inviati al servizio di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: When the track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene confrontato il track point, invia infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>al servizio di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I dati utente vengono restituiti in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can also extract data specified in Extracts from the workflow instance and send this in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: L'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime può inoltre estrarre i dati specificati in estratti dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro e inviarli in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data is encapsulated in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records and returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I dati estratti vengono incapsulati <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>Registra</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> e restituiti in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with the user event and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>oggetti estratti per specificare i dati dei membri che devono essere estratti dall'attività associata all'evento utente ed è possono aggiungere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>oggetti estratti per specificare i dati dei membri che devono essere estratti dall'attività radice del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"></xref> that specifies data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"> </xref> che specifica i dati da estrarre e inviare al servizio di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una raccolta vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di posizioni che devono essere incluse nella corrispondenza per il track point dall'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime.

trans-unit.source: If MatchingLocations is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Se MatchingLocations è vuoto, è non può corrispondere al track point dall'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime.

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to MatchingLocations for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: È necessario aggiungere almeno un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>per MatchingLocations per il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>per partecipare alla corrispondenza.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in MatchingLocations is matched and none of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Il track point corrisponderà se una qualsiasi del <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>esiste una corrispondenza per gli oggetti in MatchingLocations e nessuno del <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>gli oggetti in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>viene trovata una corrispondenza.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> che specifica le posizioni per cui trovare una corrispondenza per il track point.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una raccolta vuota.
